citation: Proclamation under the Corrections Amendment Act 2013 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Corrections Amendment Act 2013

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Corrections Amendment Act 2013 fix 1 May 2014 as the day on which that Act commences.

29 April 2014

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

Dr. VANESSA GOODWIN

Minister for Corrections

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 30 April 2014

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
